Name: Grinded Meat
About the game: 'Grinded Meat' is a survival horror live action based on Quick Time Events, set in the suburbs and woods of Quiete hill where a killer with a chainsaw tries to kill the sherif... can you survive? Real actors, real terror! 1982 – Sheriff Walter is investigating on a series of missing person cases in the small town of Quiete hill. A misterious phonecall lead him to the Carson’s mansion on the country side. There he will find a bloodthirst killer that will chase him to grind his flesh. Will you survive?
